feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is expected Wednesday morning and up to 1 cm may accumulate about higher levels of the road with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected about the road tonight. 1 to 3 cm may accumulate near the summit of the road with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected about the road tonight until tomorrow morning. 1 to 2 cm may accumulate about the highest parts of the road with lesser amounts down to 200 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow for a time Wednesday morning. 1 to 2 cm may accumulate near the summit of the road with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is possible about the road overnight and early Wednesday morning and up to 1 cm may accumulate near the summit, with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are affecting the road this morning and another 4 to 8 cm may settle on the road. Snow may to turn to rain for a time this afternoon, but changing to snow showers again tonight when a further 1 to 3 cm may settle on the road above 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is expected Wednesday morning and 1 to 2 cm may accumulate about higher levels of the road with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
